Title: S7 Ep. 287 Jenny Buccos - STEM Education and the Future of Teaching
Description:
I met @JennyBuccos back in 2022 at the Future of Education Technology Conference #FETC and at the #OrlandoScienceCenter #stemfest event. I was in awe of the #Stem program she created and produced called @EXPLR_Media that provides videos that make it possible for kids K-12 see careers in Stem and Tech. I hope you enjoy this interview and learn more about Je by and her work and most importantly get involved by volunteering. ANNOUNCEMENT!!! The National STEM Challenge is here! Calling all young inventors, robotics enthusiasts, marvelous mathletes, environmental eco-warriors, and curious coders! ⁠ ⁠ Students grades 6-12 across the U.S., start getting your STEM projects ready for the October submission window. Head to nationalstemfestival.com for all the details and deadlines.⁠

We hope you enjoy this week's episode of The Intern Whisperer.
